message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_NAME_SELECT
message.locale: Name must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A deduction of the same name already exists.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_CATEGORY_SELECT
message.locale: Category must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_DEFAULT_PERCENTAGE_NOT_IN_RANGE
message.locale: Default Percentage cannot be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_DEFAULT_PERCENTAGE_GREATER_MAX
message.locale: Default Percentage cannot be greater than the Max Deduction Percentage.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_DEFAULT_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Default Amount cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_DEFAULT_AMOUNT_GREATER_MAX
message.locale: Default Amount cannot be greater than the Max Deduction Amount.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_DEFAULT_AMOUNT_LESS_MIN
message.locale: Default Amount cannot be less than the Min Deduction Amount.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_MAX_PERCENTAGE_NOT_IN_RANGE
message.locale: Max Deduction Percentage cannot be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_MAX_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Max Deduction Amount cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_MAX_AMOUNT_LESS_MIN
message.locale: Max Deduction Amount cannot be less than Min Deduction Amount.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_MIN_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Min Deduction Amount cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_PRIORITY_POSITIVE
message.locale: Priority must be a positive whole number.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_PRIORITY_NUMERIC
message.locale: Priority must be numeric.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_ASSIGN_NEXT_PRIORITY_CANNOT_SELECT
message.locale: Assign Next Priority cannot be selected if a priority has been entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_PRIORITY_BLANK
message.locale: Assign Next Priority must be selected if a priority has not been entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_PRIORITY_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Error encountered while processing priority that already exists for an active deduction.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_CANCELED
message.locale: This deduction has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DEDUCTION_CANCELED
message.locale: This deduction is associated with at least one benefit product and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_OVERRIDEMDR_ALREADY_SET
message.locale: The Override Max Deduction Rate indicator has already been set.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_OVERRIDEMDR_ALREADY_UNSET
message.locale: The Override Max Deduction Rate indicator has already been unset.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_ALREADY_ACTIVATED
message.locale: The deduction cannot be activated as it is already active.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_ALREADY_DEACTIVATED
message.locale: The deduction cannot be deactivated as it is already inactive.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_ACTIVATE_CANCELED
message.locale: The deduction cannot be activated as it has been deleted.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_DEACTIVATE_CANCELED
message.locale: The deduction cannot be deactivated as it has been deleted.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_XRV_OVERLAPPING_DEDUCTION
message.locale: An active deduction of the same name already exists for this case with overlapping start and end dates.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: This deduction is no longer active, and therefore cannot be used.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_XRV_ASSOCIATED_PRODUCT
message.locale: No %1c has been configured for this product. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_DEDUCTION_NO_ASSOCIATED_CURRENCY
message.locale: No currency can be retrieved retrieved for the Concern Role, %1c, associated with a Third Party Deduction. Please contact your administrator.
